participant_1.background:

i ve had the same job for 8 years.
my dad was a preacher.

i will be moving to san diego in two months.

i love animals and i want to help them.
I need some time to myself.
I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
my father has a very prestigious job.

content.text: Hello, my name is John. I just moved to San Diego. I'm really excited to be here, but I don't know anyone. I'm hoping to meet some new people and make some new friends.
Hi John, I'm Jessica. I'm also new in town. I just moved here from Los Angeles. I'm also looking to meet some new people.
That's great! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play guitar. I also love animals. I'm a big fan of the San Diego Zoo.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I'm thinking about volunteering at the San Diego Zoo.
That would be so great! I'm sure you'd love it.
I think so too. I'm really excited to explore the city and meet new people.
Me too! I know we're going to have a great time here.
I think so too. What are you doing later today?
I'm not sure yet. What are you doing?
I'm not sure either. Maybe we could hang out and explore the city together?
That sounds like a great idea! I'd love to.
Great! Let's meet up at the park in an hour.
Sounds good. I'll see you there.
